tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    deletion_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value TEXT,
    deletion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_data(id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_name VARCHAR(50),
 email VARCHAR(100),
 data_description TEXT,
 deletion_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE deletion_log(log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 delete_date TIMESTAMP,
 delete_reason TEXT);

CREATE TABLE user_privacy_rights(id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 data_privacy_agreement TEXT,
 additional_notes TEXT);

CREATE TABLE company (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    admin_user_id INT,
    deletion_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (admin_user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    data_content TEXT,
    deletion_policy VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deletion_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    deleted_data_id INT,
    deletion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (deleted_data_id) REFERENCES user_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100),
    activity_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_erasure_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    erased_data_type VARCHAR(50),
    erased_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_processing_activities (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_description TEXT,
    processing_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
